name: livekit

chunks.text:
LiveKit SDK for Python

Python SDK to integrate LiveKit's real-time video, audio, and data capabilities into your Python applications using WebRTC. Designed for use with [LiveKit Agents](https://github.com/livekit/agents) to build powerful voice AI apps.

See https://docs.livekit.io/ for more information.

usage_description: This library is used to integrate real-time video, audio, and data capabilities into Python applications using WebRTC, enabling developers to build powerful voice AI apps. With LiveKit SDK for Python, developers can seamlessly integrate live video and audio streams into their applications.
